The blockquote example 6 from https://docs.asciidoctor.org/asciidoc/latest/blocks/blockquotes/[here].

> > What's new?
>
> I've got Markdown in my AsciiDoc!
>
> > Like what?
>
> * Blockquotes
> * Headings
> * Fenced code blocks
>
> > Is there more?
>
> Yep. AsciiDoc and Markdown share a lot of common syntax already.
